overview: It’s 2032. The Connect App has changed everything: it could be the answer to the social care crisis or the beginning of the commodification of care. An unlikely friendship between two strangers in four meetings, moving between BSL and spoken English. Ready to Connect? MISH + GRAHAM will form part of an innovative interactive film project WHO CARES 2032 in Autumn ’22 at Royal & Derngate Northampton.
title: Mish + Graham
